column3:
Could also mention that a help message can be printed by `-?`.

```
  -?
       Print this help message and exit

@MarcoFalke Added a help section for the `-?` option.  Small cleanup to match format of other md files in `doc/`.  [Direct link](https://github.com/jeffrade/bitcoin/blob/benchmark_output/doc/benchmarking.md) for visual.
